item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

It is the length.

"character-height = " is 19 characters.

item.title: Error, i don't know what this is!?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

characterfile.write("character-height = ", 0, 19); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(heightLevel), 0, Integer.toString(heightLevel).length()); characterfile.newLine();
I know what that is and what it does, but i am trying to make a new line above that. This is what i have…

characterfile.write("character-team = ", 0, 11); characterfile.write(playerTeam, 0, playerTeam.length()); characterfile.newLine();
Do you see the 19 at the end of the line for character-height, i need to know what that means, because i don’t know what number goes at the end of character-team. Every number i try putting there is wrong, because when the game goes to save the characters, it has some error with whatever number is there, and shuts down.
All i need to know is what that number at the end of the line means, so i know what to put at the end of mine.

Read full topic
item.source: Error, i don't know what this is!?
